# [Interview #1051: AMOL Signing Report - NutiketAiel, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1051#30)

#### NutiketAiel

#### Brandon Sanderson

When asked his favorite female Wheel of Time Character, Brandon said that it was Aviendha.
